## QAry Architecture

Flow Chart (DFD)

```mermaid
graph TD
    ES(fa:fa-server Elastic Search) --> |search results| Q(fa:fa-laptop qary)
  Q --> |search query| ES
  Q --> |upload document| ES
    API(fa:fa-server REST API) --> |question| Q
    Q --> |answer| API
  Q --> |text+question|B(fa:fa-laptop BERT)
  B --> |score+answer|Q
  W(fa:fa-cloud Wikipedia) --> |article text|Q
```
